name: sol 3000
description: SOL 3000 is based on a future Earth timeline were humanity has been fighting against a rouge mother AI system in a great war. In this science fiction action shooter you play St. Karen, a Soldier of Light armed with an advanced spiritual suit of armor and weapons. Your mission is to destroy the remaining rouge AI robot forces and strongholds, with the main objective of reaching the central hub and defeating the mother AI. Explore barren landscapes, industrial compounds, battle robotic hordes and uncover the history of Earth in the year 3000.
